intro: Stevensia samanensis, commonly known as the Saman tree, is a tropical evergreen tree native to Central and South America. It is characterized by its dense, umbrella-like canopy composed of large,革质 (leathery) leaves that are typically dark green on the upper surface and lighter on the underside.
